This afternoon I took three singares and four problems. Four singaras were good, the problem is four are spoiled, then I return them. They give me chicken rolls, these are spoiled Why is old food sold here?

I got food from here for the first time because a friend treated me here. This was good to eat at around 6 PM and actually yummy while eating. Hours later my stomach burns and I threw up. Please don‚Äôt go here unless ur ready for a night of stomach pain.

I like the place nice and clean,, chicken over rice is so yummy
The food is delicious and the service is excellent.  It is definitely a good alternative to restaurants belonging to fast food chains when you want to buy the food "to go" anyway.
The food is absolutely outstanding! The crew goes above and beyond with their politeness and warmth, making the experience even more enjoyable. You simply must give it a try!

I stopped by Halal Gyro King Deli on 204th St in the Bronx, and wow I was seriously impressed! I ordered the falafel over rice and it was absolutely delicious. The falafel was crispy on the outside, soft and flavorful on the inside, and perfectly seasoned. The rice was fresh and fluffy, and the white sauce and hot sauce combo took it to the next level.

The portion size was generous too definitely worth the price. The staff were super friendly and quick with the service. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back here whenever I‚Äôm in the neighborhood. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre craving good halal food in the Bronx!

Very clean and hygienic, place is organized and modern and the menu is big. The food is some of the best halal food I've had in a while.
Everything is good
They don‚Äôt know when to stop putting hot sauce , my food was too spicy. I also got sick the next day, the rice had no flavor. The meat was good which is a shame

Great priced spot, I particularly recommend the halal rice platters, they add sauteed onions and peppers and top with fresh topped cilantro that really elevated the dish. Their green spicy sauce is also a nice addition to a standard halal platter.

Mixed gyro platter was super delicious and fresh. The staff was nice and it was very easy to order.
Really liked the fact that they had hot sauce and other sauces already in to go containers to make it easier for take out.

Great food, very reasonably priced and quality. Would love if they had an option of a lamb or beef salad. I usually order the chicken salad for pick up. And every time it's fantastic. Highly recommend.
Great food, hard working people. I will definitely be coming back.
